name: Bob the Buisnessman (Vampire)
description:
A&M Chillenium 2016 Game Jam project
Theme - Foofaraw

Programmer - Tomer Braff
Artists - Taylor Chojecki, Keaton Hedgecoke

Controls
A/D - Left and Right
W - Jump
S - Crouch (with A/D to crouch walk)
Right Shift - Dash

You're a vampire late for work at your pencil pushing job. Dash between shadowed objects and get to your work on time.
